para.para: GPIO Extension HAL module driver. This file provides firmware functions to manage the following functionalities of the General Purpose Input/Output (GPIO) extension peripheral.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: GPIO Extension HAL module driver. This file provides firmware functions to manage the following functionalities of the General Purpose Input/Output (GPIO) extension peripheral.

formalpara.title: Author
formalpara.para:
MCD Application Team
Extended features functions

literallayout.computeroutput:
============================================================================== ##### GPIO Peripheral extension features ##### ============================================================================== [..] GPIO module on STM32F1 family, manage also the AFIO register: (+) Possibility to use the EVENTOUT Cortex feature
##### How to use this driver ##### ============================================================================== [..] This driver provides functions to use EVENTOUT Cortex feature (#) Configure EVENTOUT Cortex feature using the function HAL_GPIOEx_ConfigEventout() (#) Activate EVENTOUT Cortex feature using the HAL_GPIOEx_EnableEventout() (#) Deactivate EVENTOUT Cortex feature using the HAL_GPIOEx_DisableEventout()
